review: such a perfect game a magical blend of everything i love collecting and selling social interactions adorable characters with rich development witches and mythical content even some romance love love love im on my third play through amazingly complex story with so many arcs and things to explore even when youre done the game you arent done the game the creators put so much into this game and i cant thank them enough for so far 60 hours of quality entertainment and enjoyment
very fun

wylde flowers is one of the best cozy games ive played almost every single interaction is voiceacted using the tools is seamless you just click the item and the right tool is used no inventory management also magic and a bunch of cute romanceable characters
game has a great story line good mix of cozy gaming with farming simulation
great game

cute farming witchy game the story has me coming back and wondering whats going to happen characters have depth and back stories i love how i can go into settings as many times as i want and speed up or slow down the gamesometimes i just want to chill and mosey along and sometimes i want to speed run through stuff also praise the creators for making the fishing mechanic easy for once put this on your wishlist because its great

i am currently 8 hrs into the game and i can tell you that i am  bored of it   as others have stated you spend most of the day running around in circles none the less  it is a slow grind and a lot slower than other cozy games   the stamina is a real drag the characters are nice and the dialog is quite intriguing  as of right now i would not recommend this game its like a mobile game that i paid 20 for for my pc

i enjoy this game immensely i like a fun farming game but the extra spells and potions are a nice addition stopping time while getting the work done around the farm in the morning is especially delicious the petting animations makes it feel like theres really a weight to the animals controlling when seasons change is awesome too im 30 hours in and ive only just reached winter but im looking forward to continuing on this journey
